content.display_name: Get Ready For NEET 2024 - for Grades 11 & 12
content.overview: About the Course This course helps students understand difficult topics easily with the help of learning videos and practice sheets. Subjects covered in this course are Physics, Chemistry and Maths. The course will prepare students to score better marks in the NEET entrance examination. Students will get in-depth solutions after an extensive core study, designed by Subject Matter Experts. Course contains video lectures for all the chapters in detail, which can be accessed 24X7. SpeEdLabs practice sessions create AI-driven question sets for improved output and performance of an individual student. Based on students' strengths and weaknesses, adaptive practice provides questions that are right for students' learning needs, i.e., a personalised improvement plan. The analytical dashboard feature gives a clear picture of students' position throughout their learning journey in the most concise manner. It helps students to bridge the learning gaps. The platform generates personalized concept recommendations for each student based on their learning outcomes. The SpeEdLabs platform cross-references the efforts of each student with concepts and gives personalized analysis and suggestions. After the subscription, kindly download the Application on Google Store or Apple Store. Some content videos may be in Hinglish for better understanding of concepts. Features Learn Tab will help students to revise concepts in a conceptual animated video format which is accessible 24x7 Downloadable study material Practice Tab will help students to have personalized adaptive practice as per an individual's IQ level The real-time analytical reports generated will help students to have peer performance comparisons Personal Improvement Plan Doubt application will enable students to post their doubts Test Tab will help students to self-assess About The Partner SpeEdLabs is an Artificial Intelligence-based adaptive learning and practice platform for students in grades 6-12 and JEE/NEET. SpeEdLabs, thrive in a conceptual thinking world. Their vision is to provide a top-notch, technology-based learning and practice platform to students at an affordable price, thus empowering every student to grow to their full potential. They aim to provide personalized education to every student and build a bridge between dreams and capabilities. Testimonials Mr. Anmol Gupta (Parent) Sonakshi was associated with SpeedLabs, she is currently pursuing her education from IIT. All the credit of her getting into IIT goes to SpeedLabs. Before joining SpeedLabs, Sonakshi was really frustrated and worried about her studies. During her gap year I observed that every mentor at SpeedLabs was very much committed towards the learning process, which was phenomenal. Every time we were stuck, the personalized guidance of SpeedLabs helped us. It has been an amazing journey. Ms. Dhwani Shivaram (Student) I was not acquainted with the major subjects in the stream of commerce, these were new to me when I entered Class 11th. SpeedLabs helped me to understand all the concepts and gave me a gist of everything. The mentors have provided me with a great learning experience, they have been very kind. The tests and worksheets have helped me to a large extent. The online sessions are crafted to make us understand everything in a very easy manner. After this journey with SpeedLabs, I have performed really well in Class 11th, which would have not been possible without SpeedLabs. content.display_name: The First Global Etiquette Olympiad Dedicated to Etiquette Studies - for Grade 3
content.overview: About the Course Awareness is key – children are likely to display good etiquette if they are aware of it. Through the Global Etiquette Olympiad (GEO) program, they provide a structured approach to etiquette. The curriculum is designed by experts to ensure low cognitive load. The learnings from the curriculum are immediately useable and enrich the learner’s life instantly. Features The progression from one grade to the next is structured in a manner that builds on prior learning. The curriculum is designed by experts. Children become more respectful and courteous. Awareness of etiquette in various situations helps them become more confident. They develop pleasant, cultured, and respected personalities. The learnings complement academic education and help the child’s holistic development. Promotes good manners and etiquette and empowers individuals to be good human beings. Assessment This competition is open to students from grades 3 to 12. Online assessment. The assessment consists of 25 questions worth 4 points each. There is no negative scoring. All questions are in MCQ format. The maximum time provided for the exam is 30 minutes. About The Partner The International Centre for Etiquette Research is a private organisation dedicated to studying global etiquette. They aim to help people understand each other and treat each other better through the knowledge and practice of good etiquette. They develop etiquette-related courses and books that will help people understand the nuances of interacting with each other. Course Structure The topics covered are: Greetings Personal Hygiene Personal Appearance Taking Care of Your Belongings Cheerfulness Kindness Speech Honesty Table Manners Punctuality Road Sense Mobile Phone Usage It is a self-paced course, available online only. Certification COMPLETION CERTIFICATE
content.short_description: Introducing the Global Etiquette Olympiad (GEO), the world's premier international competition celebrating the art of etiquette. Sign up now and let your child learn good manners effortlessly to empower them to be better global citizens.

content.display_name: Master Your Communication Skills by Improving English Vocabulary
content.overview: About the Course SpellQuest is an English enhancement program that is organized into 3 steps and reduces the gap between students' understanding and speaking of vocabulary. The structure of our programme is divided into three levels, viz. Intra level, State Level and Grand Finale (National Level). Study material will be provided by VocaQuest, which needs to be referred to for the competition. The competition will take place on an online portal, where our invigilators monitor students on the other hand. That makes sure the students are being monitored thoroughly. Students from Class I to Class XII are eligible to participate in this competition. Bring the excitement of fun and learn by registering now at Uniform Junction. At the end of every academic year, an award ceremony is organized to praise the winners and uplift their morale, encouraging them to set new goals. We believe that the foundation has to be strong for a building to stand tall. Let us help you build one by enrolling with us. Features Students learn new words Improve in spoken English Boost Confidence Interact with students to perform well and learn more E-certificate, with exciting Prizes Structure Every round will have unique questions to answer, which will be asked from the study material given at every level. Every candidate will be tracked by the invigilator during the time of examination. Study material will be provided for all 3 levels for reference. About The Partner What's SpellQuest? SpellQuest is an English vocabulary enhancement program that helps children enhance their English communicative skills. The program aims to make children competitively learn new words. SpellQuest is a product of IOVA Edtech Pvt. Ltd. IOVA is an educational platform that offers a wide range of learning opportunities to students in terms of new technology like Metaverse, Designing on Canva, Financial Literacy, and English enhancement programs with different prizes. It also caters to space planetarium shows all across India. SpellQuest is designed to boost creativity and rational thinking in children. SpellQuest aims to give children the exposure to learn new vocabulary in a fun and competitive manner to get great rewards in return, which motivates them further. Terms & Conditions Terms and Guidelines Of SpellQuest Guide to enrol, Follow the steps below: 1. Log on to https: learning.uniformjunction.com/ on your phone/desktop/laptop 2. Select SpellQuest / Click on the register tab 3. Fill & submit the form with appropriate details 4. Select the suitable payment plan 5. Make the payment After registration, the candidates will receive an e-book. Intra-school level examination will be conducted in the month of September or October, through our online portal on Uniform Junction. Result will be declared within 25 working days after the examination. All the information regarding examination will be conveyed to the candidates via messages on the registered mobile number. SpellQuest is a brand name of IOVA EdTech Pvt Ltd . (“SpellQuest” or “We”) is a private limited company incorporated under the Companies Act of India This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) applies to the services extended by the SpellQuest Sites and App (“Services”). This Policy describes only our online information collection and use practices at the Sites and the App; it doesn’t apply to information we collect about you offline, such as over the phone or in person. By using our Services, you consent to this Policy. We reserve the right to amend the Policy and amendments will be effective as of the moment of publication on the Sites. You should check the Sites regularly for amendments. We are committed towards the security of your privacy and this document further details our information practices. COLLECTION OF YOUR INFORMATION BY US When you use SpellQuest, You provide us with two types of information: (i) information you submit via the Service and (ii) information regarding your use of the Service collected by us as you interact with the Service. SpellQuest does not stores your IP address when you login to the website or download the app. Also, your device ID and type are stored in case of app. Once inside the website or app, you are prompted to make an account and during this process we may collect your email address, name, phone number, address and other personal details. We may also ask you to share the OTP sent via SMS or a password or to verify a link sent on your e-mail address. All this is necessary to uniquely identify and authenticate you. This will only happen with your permission. While you are using our services on web or app, we record your responses and activity data, including but not limited to, textual and voice responses and session details. Reasons for collecting Information: We use personal details and other information to maintain the general and personalised content and functionality of the Service, only to make it possible to accommodate your requests, and so that we are able to provide you with service when using our Services and for the purposes set out elsewhere in this Policy. 5. To help you with the details and upcoming events on your devices 6. To respond to your query with adequate knowledge 7. To send periodic emails for sharing information and updates pertaining to your order, occasional company news, updates, related product or service information, etc. PAYMENT: We may use and share the User information with reliable and reputed third-party payment gateway to whom we are associated in order to ensure swift and comfortable payment mechanism for the User. The third-party payment gateway and other payment transaction processors, have their own privacy policies in respect to the information we are required to provide to them for your purchase-related transactions. For these providers, we recommend that you read their privacy policies so you can understand the manner in which your personal information and your credit/debit card details will be handled by these providers. Once you leave our apps or website or are redirected to a third-party website or application, you are no longer governed by this Privacy Policy or our website’s Terms of Service. SECURITY OF YOUR INFORMATION At SpellQuest, we are committed to the security of your privacy which is why we have taken adequate measures to ensure that your information is safe with us. However, since no system can guarantee 100% safety against hackers, we advise you to use the website assuming that the details you share with us maybe compromised in case of a cyber security breach. REVISION OF POLICY SpellQuest reserves the right to revise this privacy policy as and when needed and a notice of revision, in case of material changes, will be provided on the website. However, it is your responsibility to stay updated on any policy revisions and we will take your continued use of our services as the acceptance of the new policies. MORE INFORMATION If you still have questions regarding privacy issues and how we handle your information that we store, please feel free to reach us at info@spellquest.in Guideline to follow during Examination: Dear Parents/ Candidates, SpellQuest welcomes you to Intra level online competition hosted on Uniform Junction. In the following document, we will take you through the examination process. The examination will be conducted through online remote Proctor software where the AI (Artificial Intelligence) will be keeping track on every single activity of the child. This means when the candidate will start the exam, his/her activities will be recorded and live monitoring will be done by our invigilation team during the examination. Please read our complete tutorial guide for better understanding of the examination. All the best!! TERMS & CONDITIONS FOR CANDIDATES AND PARENTS The exam accounts for a total of 60 marks with 60 questions. The intra school level book will be applicable for the exam. The paper pattern of the exam is same as given in the study material. (Please note: For Class 1, 2- The questions will be MCQ only. For Class 3,4, 5,6,7,8, 9 & 10 – The questions will be subjective, MCQ, 1-2 word/s or short answer. The exam duration is of one hour. There is no negative marking. In order to avoid any mishaps and confusion, candidates must click on the link and login only on the allotted date and time. Candidates must login 15 minutes before the assigned exam time (for e.g.- Exam time allocated to candidate is 10 am – 11 am, then they need to login at 9.45 am and not before that since the login tab will be activated 15 minutes prior to the exam. Logins will only be allowed only till 10 minutes once the exam starts, after that late logins `won’t be allowed). Each candidate will get three attempts at login. Parents can provide assistance to the candidates during the login process only. Once the exam begins parents are requested to leave the candidates alone throughout the examination. Parents of Class I & IIcan only provide assistance to the candidates in reading the questions only. While doing so, kindly sit behind the child. Please note that the exam will be live monitored by our proctors (invigilators) and they will be able to hear and see the candidates very clearly. Parents and kids refrain using regional language for conversation. Use English or Hindi language only. You will be under live observation throughout the examination and your activities will be recorded. In case of any suspicious activity, the proctor will send three warnings. The proctor reserves the right to pause or end the examination if the candidate continues to break the rules despite warnings. Pause Exam- If your exam is paused, please do not panic and exit the browser or end exam, as it is done by your invigilator. This will occur only when the child is either moving out of the frame, exiting the exam window or is getting any kind of help. So to avoid that please keep an eye on the message box as the invigilator will send necessary information. Candidates are requested to not move once the examination begins. If a candidate moves out of the frame for a longer period, it will lead to disqualification. Message Box- If the students have any query, they can type in the message box and the invigilator will be happy to help them. (For Phone users, please click on 3 lines in the top right corner to view the message box). Candidates appearing for exam from Mobile Phone please keep check on your message box. Candidates make sure that the camera and microphone is in working condition to ensure smooth functioning of the examination. Usage of headphones/earphones/airpods/earpods is prohibited during examination. The candidates will be under live observation throughout the exam. Any suspicious activity (like using study material, talking to someone or taking any kind of help) will lead to on the spot disqualification. Once the examination begins, do not try to open another browser or exit the browser. In case you do, two statutory warning will be given before disqualification. After the completion of the examination, candidates must necessarily click on END EXAM in order to get their exam submitted. In case any candidate fails to do so and exits the page (and has already received two statutory warnings), it will result in disqualification. Please note, the exam will only get submitted for evaluation under two circumstances- either the candidate clicks on end exam or when the exam time gets over. In case of network disturbance, the candidate will only get logged out and can resume the exam from where they left. For assistance call- 9702620933. The results will be declared in 25 working days. SpellQuest / Uniform Junction reserves all the rights to disqualify any candidate on the grounds of unethical behaviour and/or found not abiding by the above mentioned rules and regulations. In any given circumstances, SpellQuest’s decision will be final. Please read carefully all the steps of Remote Proctor exam. TECHNOLOGICAL GUIDE Candidates appearing for the Remote Proctor Exam must ensure the following - The candidates can appear for the exam from Desktop/laptop/tablet or Smart Mobile phone (android mobile). Apple(iOS) gadgets like Iphone, Ipad, Samsung A series phones will not support this proctor exam (It can be operated on MacBook provided the link is opened in latest version of Google Chrome Browser). Please open link on the latest version of Google Chrome Browser only (preferably use incognito mode). Kindly refrain from using any other browser, as it will not support it. In order to start the exam, candidates must allow access to microphone, camera and location. The candidates must have an active internet connection (4G/5G/Wifi). In case of using mobile data, minimum data of 500 MB is essential for a smooth and successful run of the examination. During exam please ensure integrated web camera (front camera in case of Mobile/Tablet) and microphone are in proper working condition. If not, the software won’t allow the candidate to appear for the exam.
content.short_description: Improve your communication skills by enrolling in this English vocabulary course. Enhance your performance in competitive exams by equipping yourself with a wealth of new words.

content.display_name: Master the Fundamentals of Electronics and Arduino Programming
content.overview: About the Course Fundamentals of Electronics and Arduino Programming This course is an introduction to electronic components and building circuits. The learners will learn programming with an Arduino microcontroller board to automate them. Students can avail this course to learn how to design their circuit boards/ PCB. After learning the PCB design, they can automate their circuits by programming it with Arduino so that they become autonomous. Features Learning about basic component level understanding, deciding what to use and when. Understanding the limitations and advantages of each component. Students will be using a platform that allows them to make circuit’s virtually and program them to simulate and see the desired outcome if done using physical components. Evaluations at various levels to check the performance of every child. Ample practice activities for the child to gain confidence in programming and track their progress with each activity. About The Mentor Mufaddal Kagalwala Mufaddal Kagalwala is a STEM trainer for students and educators. He has 10+ years of experience and has personally curated a number of products in the educational toy industry, STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) domain. He is also the chief trainer for LEGO Education, Arduino Education, Strawbees Education, Kubo Education, Sam Labs. Having experience in the industry and designing so many products, he has taken up to educate students about STEM and its benefits.Having a career and focus on STEM is the next big bubble as compared to in the past in becoming a successful Doctor or Engineer, the reason today majority of the things are technology-driven. As a teacher, he has interacted with hundreds of students, trained, and built their interest in this field. Having said this the students have benefited by understanding the concepts taught to them in theory reinforced. Awards and Accolades Awarded to be the Chief trainer for Duck Learning India. About The Partner Established in 2007, Duck Learning was founded by, a third-generation Singaporean, after his own individual experiences in education as an adult volunteer leader in a newly established uniformed group and an as an educator. Thereby achieving success Duck Learning started its branch in India in 2016 at Navi Mumbai. Since then, they have been a growing organization with enthusiastic people in the STEM industry. They hosted two seasons of FLL India (International LEGO competition, whereby conducting Nationals of India and those students going international for competition), and STEM conference held in 2020 at Garodia International School, Ghatkopar. Their journey so far has been remarkable and hoping more to come around as per the new educational policy laid down by the education ministry in 2020. Course Structure How many Sessions? 24 sessions Session Topics 1.Topic Platform and Components Outcomes Introduction to platform, creation of accounts, platform interface and building 1st circuit Duration 40 minutes 2.Topic Basic Circuit Outcomes Building the 1st circuit and modify to add more components and learn about the same Duration 40 minutes 3.Topic Add on to Circuit Outcomes Taking the existing circuit to the next level with introduction to more newer components and understanding their controls Duration 40 minutes 4.Topic Learning Sensor 1 Outcomes Introduction to PIR Motion sensor Duration 40 minutes 5.Topic Learning Sensor 2 Outcomes Introduction to Tilt sensor Duration 40 minutes 6.Topic Intermediated Circuit Outcomes Build circuits incorporating all that has been taught earlier to make it work together with more components and synchronization of components Duration 40 minutes 7.Topic Introduction to Arduino Outcomes Introducing the micro controller board and it's components Duration 40 minutes 8.Topic Progamming with Arduino Outcomes Creating the basic code to program, Arduino board Duration 40 minutes 9.Sensors with Arduino 1 My blocks Outcomes Learn to add sensor to the board and control it to become autonomous - Ultrasonic sensor Duration 40 minutes 10.Sensors with Arduino 2 My blocks Outcomes Learn to add sensor to the board and control it to become autonomous – Motion Sensor Duration 40 minutes
content.short_description: Sign up now and embark on an exciting journey to learn the basics of electronics and program Arduino in Tinkercad. Learn to create your very own micro automation projects.

content.display_name: Learn Acting with Manoj Bajpai
content.overview: About the Course MANOJ BAJPAYEE TEACHES ACTING In this 2-hour 44 minutes class of 25 lessons, Manoj Bajpayee teaches acting. You can avail the course with onetime payment method, and it will be accessible for lifetime. The users can access all lessons after payment. These courses can be availed on any device. Features One time payment Watch on any device Lifetime access Certificate of completion Course Structure 25 Sessions2 hours 44 minutes Topic name: Lesson 1: What is acting : [2 minutes] Lesson 2: Manoj Bajpayee’s Journey : [10 minutes] Lesson 3: Navras : [20 minutes] Lesson 4: Cracking Auditions : [6 minutes] Lesson 5: Breaking down the script : [4 minutes] Lesson 6: Getting inspiration for the character : [6 minutes] Lesson 7: Creating character biographies : [5 minutes] Lesson 8: Creating physical attributes of the character : [5 minutes] Lesson 9: Catching dialects : [4 minutes] Lesson 10: Stage vs Camera : [4 minutes] Lesson 11: Method acting : [3 minutes] Lesson 12: Improvisation : [2 minutes] Lesson 13: The director actor relationship : [7 minutes] Lesson 14: On set collaboration : [2 minutes] Lesson 15: Voice Training : [8 minutes] Lesson 16: Dubbing : [5 minutes] Lesson 17: Keeping in touch with reality : [4 minutes] Lesson 18: Dealing with criticism : [4 minutes] Lesson 19: Perseverance : [5 minutes] Student session 1: 8 minutes Student session 2: 10 minutes Student session 3: 16 minutes Case Study: 8 minutes Conclusion: 1 minute Course Pricing: Rs. 999 About The Mentor Manoj Bajpai Manoj Bajpayee is one of the finest actors of this generation. Over these years, Bajpayee has played all kinds of roles with conviction from the hero to the antagonist. Besides films in the Hindi language, he has also acted in Tamil and Telugu movies. His method acting has a distinguished style that makes him an inspiration to anyone who dares to be an actor. To date, he has two National Film Awards and four Filmfare Awards under his belt. He also received the prestigious Padma Shri in 2019 for his contributions to art. About The Partner About Unluclass Unluclass is a place where real life achievers teach you to turn your hobby into your talent. It’s a place where industry experts give you a glimpse of their journey of struggle to stardom. Listen to them, learn from them, aspire to be like them. FAQs 1) How do I purchase an Unluclass? You can buy an Unluclass by clicking on our ‘Buy now’ option and paying online. Once you buy a class you get unlimited access to it and you can view it anytime and learn at your own pace. 2) How are courses designed and what other things come with it? Unluclass is an immersive online experience. The curriculum for each Unluclass is designed by your teachers. Each class includes lessons on different topics that cover the course, an especially designed Unluclass workbook, interactive assignments, daily exercises, and community activities. After purchase, the videos can be viewed, paused, fast-forwarded, and re-watched as many times as you like 3) How long is the course? Depending upon the course content, each course consists of around 2-6+ hours of video content which is split up into individual videos that you can watch anytime. In addition to the lesson videos, each course has a carefully designed workbook that comes in PDF format for you to easily download and print. The workbook can be used for an in-depth understanding of different topics from the class 4) How long are the video lessons? Unluclass range anywhere from 2-6 hours in length and each class is made up of several lessons that range from 5-30 minutes in length-some classes may have longer lessons 5) Do I have to complete a course within a specific time frame? No. You can complete a class at your own pace. You get unlimited access to every class you purchase individually. 6) What type of device / browser do I need? You can learn and view the Unluclass on any internet-enabled device, on any modern browser. 7) Can I download the videos? The video lessons are not available to download.
content.short_description: Master your acting skills with the one and only Manoj Bajpayee. Join his exclusive Unluclass and discover secret tips to ace auditions, understand screenplays, deliver outstanding performances, and handle criticism. Enroll now to be inspired from the Maestro himself!

content.display_name: Learn C++ Programming with Practical Kit- Level 2
content.overview: About the Course This course comes with a practical kit which will be delivered at the given residential address within 10 working days after the enrollment. For continuous coordination and communication, a WhatsApp group of 4 students is created and a professor is appointed for the online sessions.All the sessions are conducted via Zoom or Google Meet. Students will perform practicals on their kit as guided by the tutor and will learn C++ coding for the given set of experiments. Students will be assessed periodically via activities and projects assigned to them. They will be working on a real C++ technical coding language and not be cheated by block coding. After completing this course, students will be compatible with any coding languages used across the globe. They can implement any automation-related project in school and are capable of writing thousands of real-life projects on any high-end controller. The syllabus content is in English, but the tutor can explain in both English or Hindi depending on the complexity of the concept for better understanding. Prerequisite: 1. Knowledge of LEVEL-1 is needed. 2. If a student wants to enrol directly without having completed their level 1, he/she will have to give an exam. They are eligible only if they clear the exam. Find the syllabus below:- Features 1. Text Coding C++ (No Block Coding) 2. Individual Practical kit 3. kit provided can be used multiple times and for more than 100 projects 4. kit and controller provided can be used for school science projects 5. Simulator-based teaching 6. All teachers are engineers 7. One demo lecture 8. Covers embedded C 9. Event handling using sensors About The Tutor All the tutors assigned to teach the course are well qualified and have completed B.E/M.E/Btech/Mtech in electronics or computer. About The Partner GarudTech Coding, a brand of Garud Tech Ventures, offers online coding with practicals for kids. Garud Tech is based in Mumbai and aims to provide practical coding experience to students to help them remember coding easily and enhance their logical skills. Course Structure Total no. of sessions 25 sessions Duration of each session 2 sessions weekly of 1hr Assessment Activity & Project based: 25 classwork + 25 Homework + 5 PROJECTS. Certification & Trophy COMPLETION CERTIFICATE Kit Contents Terms & Conditions 1)Fees should be paid in advance. 2) For claiming a refund, you have to inform within the first 5 lectures. 3) In Case of a refund, you have to return the kit in good working condition then the refund will be initiated from us within seven working days. Refund Policy 100% refund policy if not satisfied with course.
content.short_description: Discover the captivating realm of event handling and sensor-based coding! Level up your skills and delve deeper into the world of physical sensor and output device interfaces. Register now and learn to automate science tasks like a pro!

content.display_name: Virtual Internship Program -Fund Management
content.overview: About the Course FUND MANAGEMENT For candidates passing out of B. Com. M.Com, MBA(Finance) or CA courses, Fund Management is one of the most rewarding and lucrative careers. It is all about managing investors fund in a fund management company. Financial Reports and more Deft fund management skills can get you up the value chain. You may be blessed with the responsibility of managing thousands of crores of investors’ money. The higher you go up the value chain, the more are the rewards it is going to fetch you. However, there are a lot of things that you need to know and be aware of before you invest the fund in a particular stock, bond or asset. While you may have learnt a lot about different financial assets and money market instruments, there are some more things that you need to learn before taking the plunge in fund management. Our Virtual Internship Program can offer you just that extra knowledge. Features Practical Experience During the virtual internship program you will learn to do the tasks that professional fund managers do. Detailed VIP Report Our team of experts will analyze your performance and provide you with an in depth report about your standing with respect to fund management skill. Easy Online Access Access the program from the comfort of your home at any time. Professional Guidance Experts in the field of fund management like Mr.Dhruvesh Sanghvi will guide you through the maze of fund management avenues and help you to make the right choice. Program Content Let's understand what fund management is all about. Why do people invest and what are the places they can invest? Screen Companies The first step of fund management is screening companies. Fund managers have to screen several companies before shortlisting a few. Let's understand how fund managers do this. Screening Companies Activity You have been provided with a checklist. You have also been provided with an Excel with various parameters of 5 companies. You need to screen the companies and see which company fulfills all the criteria. (Activity) Read About The Company Once fund managers have shortlisted companies, they then read, think and analyze several companies. Read About The Company Activity Read the Chairman's speech from the Annual Report and answer a few questions. (Activity) Financials In this step, fund managers look at the financials of companies and also understand the business of the company. Financials and Understanding The Business Carefully read the value chain of the company and predict what could be the revenues and expenses of the company. (Activity) Interaction with Management Fund managers have to often interact with management to understand more about the business. Let's understand what exactly they do in this step. Valuation Fund managers assign a value to the company based on the several complex calculations. Learn more about this step in this section. Valuation Activity A simple method of valuation has been provided to you. Follow the rules and calculate the value of the company. Compare it to the Market Price and decide if you will buy or sell the stock. (Activity) How Does A Stock Market Work? Let’s understand the procedure in which the process of buying and selling shares works. Invest In The Right Company Based on the news and company analysis, decide which company shares you would like to buy or sell. (Activity) Conclusion In this section, we understand the Challenges, work life balance, job satisfaction and other aspects of a funds manger's life. About The Mentor DHRUVESH SANGHVI Mr.Dhruvesh Sanghvi is an esteemed financial expert. He is an Engineer, an MBA, and a SEBI registered Research Analyst. He has been working in the financial market for many years. He is passionate about equity, and has his own fund management company, Prospero Tree Financial Services. He is very adept in the art and science of equity investment. His investments create value in the long run. The best thing about our virtual internship program is that it lets you interact with such a wizard and listen to his advice and teachings. About The Partner IMMRSE Through Immrse's online Virtual Internship Program (VIP) you can train as a restauranteer, a lawyer, dentist and more. This online tutoring program lets you learn the nuances of every industry from the comfort of your home, anytime, and anywhere. The virtual courses conducted here enable you to become industry ready and join your preferred industry with a good hands on training and certification. FAQs 1) What is VIP? Virtual Internship Program™ (VIP) provides students with a hands-on practical experience of an occupation in real life-like situations. 2) Which age group does VIP cater to? Virtual Internship Program™ (VIP) provides students with a hands-on practical experience of an occupation in real life-like situations. 3) How is VIP different from other Career Counseling? VIP is one step higher than career counseling. Unlike career counseling, VIP gives users a platform to understand a profession directly from an expert professional (through videos) as well as gives an opportunity for users to practically experience a profession (through activities) before they actually choose upon a particular career. Also, unlike traditional career counseling, through VIP, the user gets to take their own career decisions, based on how a particular profession interested them practically. VIP focuses more on career specific practical skill analysis. 4) Will VIP benefit children who are sure of their career choice? Yes, as it will serve the opportunity to the child to get a hands-on practical exposure to the career/s he/she is sure about. It provides a golden chance to gain an in-depth knowledge about that particular field ranging from every minute detail to holistic picture. The VIP assessment is unbiased. Through VIP, students will be able to confidently take decision with accuracy and precision. 5) What are the benefits of VIP? VIP is a very unique, innovative, scientific, and tech-savvy program which is very easy for students to register as it taps into their audio-visual senses. Students get an opportunity to get hands-on exposure to every realm of the field by practically TRYING different careers, rather than by assuming facts. Students get a 360°, holistic, and unbiased perspective of each career. The Practical skill sets of the student’s chosen and performed profession is analysed by our expert psychologists. A comprehensive, detailed, and scientific report is generated. The students are provided with Virtual Internship certificates that can be used to enhance their CV/resume. VIP compiles the experience of multiple physical internships into a 1-2.5 hours Virtual Internship, which allows the student to gain experience worth multiple months in a very time-effective way. 6) Why should students studying in the secondary standards in schools should take the VIP? Students are expected to select subjects and streams right from 8th grade onwards. Through VIP, students will get a very clear goal about their future profession and will make it very easy for them to take subject and stream choices. Taking the program early on also gives the student the opportunity to develop skills required specially for their dream careers. VIP also gives an opportunity for both students and parents to develop a few future plan of action. They can start preparing for entrance exams, finding out about coaching and making necessary budgetary allocations. 7) Does Immrse offer any guarantee / assurance about a child’s success in the chosen career? One’s success depends on his/her willingness, inclination, personal preferences among others. However, IMMRSE strives to provide the users with an ever-lasting experience through the VIP, which will ensure the users to achieve success. 8) How long will each Virtual Internship Program (VIP) take? Each VIP takes minimum 1 hour to maximum 2 and half hours depending on multiple individual factors like – Disturbances/Distractions Number of breaks/pauses taken No of times videos have been replayed Time taken to solve the simulations Individual’s attempt at taking notes during the VIP, etc. 9) What are the requirements / needs for VIP? In the VIP, industry leaders and experts give you an in-depth analysis of your chosen career by explaining you about the work involved as well as future prospects. Each VIP has been designed after speaking to 20-30 industry experts from each career. The simulations have been crafted to ensure you get more than sufficient information to enable you to make a well-informed career choice.
content.short_description: Confused about which career to choose? Would you like to step into the world of a fund manager like Rakesh Jhunjhunwala or Warren Buffet? Curious to see how you would fare advising someone on how to manage their investments? Practically experience the activities that make up the day of a fund manager, like screening companies, valuation, investments, etc. Test yourself as a Fund Manager through our online Virtual Internship Program (VIP), simply from the comfort of your home, anytime, anywhere!

content.display_name: Learn to Play Ukelele with Beginners Course
content.overview: About the Course This course is for learners who want to start learning to play the ukulele. This course will enable the learners to : Develop foundational skills, techniques and musical understanding of a string instrument Learn string instruments like the guitar or shift to guitar after a year of learning Prerequisites: Interest in Music Topics taught in this course are: Introduction to Ukulele Fundamental Finger Techniques Major Scale Study and melodies Music Theory Basic Chords and Strumming 10+ Popular tunes and songs The Learning Outcomes of this course are: Students will be able to Play 10+ songs on Ukulele Demonstrate proper finger technique and ergonomics. Distinguish and play different rhythmic patterns Execute Strumming and chords Showcase a live performance Features The features of the Ukulele Foundation Course are: Ideal for beginners of Ukulele instrument playing Serves as a good base for learners of string instrument playing as they can shift from playing the ukulele to playing the guitar Helps develop foundational skills and techniques for playing string instruments About The Partner Spardha is a futuristic digital platform for online music education. They provide music learning through a curated curriculum, certified trainers and personalized musical journeys for various student needs. They offer the product in 3 different flavours - Green Field musical journey for first-time music explorers. Passion-oriented musical journey designed for people across various age groups who want to learn music as a hobby, passion or life skill. Certification-oriented musical journey for serious music learners. content.display_name: Learn to Speak English Fluently with Captivating Hindi Stories
content.overview: About the Course इंग्लिश गुरु में आपका स्वागत हैं! यह कोर्स का पाठ्यक्रम अनुसन्धान आधारित हैं! छोटी छोटी कहानियों के द्वारा, इस प्रोग्राम में विशेषज्ञों के मार्गदर्शनसे सरल बोली अंग्रेजी सिखानेका प्रयोग किया हैं ! इस कोर्स -बुनियादी स्तर की संरचना १९ भागों में की गयी हैं! प्रत्येक भाग में ४-५ पाठ हैं! भाग के अंत में भाग के पाठों पर आधारित परीक्षा ली जाती है, जिससे आप अपनी प्रदर्शन को ट्रैक कर सके! उम्मीद हैं आपकी अंग्रेजी सीखने की यह यात्रा आनंदायी होगी!. Welcome to English Guru Program! The Program attempts to help the user learn few simple words and sentences in English which can be used in day-to-day conversations. The Program is divided into 2 levels - Basic and Advance. Each level has Modules consisting of Lessons which cover small aspect of spoken English through Bi-lingual story based conversations. Each Module also has a short quiz for revision. Basic Level has 19 modules. You have to complete these 19 modules to graduate to Advance Level Features Key Highlights of the Basic Course (o) 19 Modules including 90 Lessons, Introductions, Summaries and Tests for each Lesson. (o) All lessons follow learning through situational stories (o) 100+ Questions and Answers (o) Live Sessions About The Partner English Guru English Guru Program attempts to help the user learn a few simple words and sentences in English everyday, which can be used in various day-to-day conversations and situations. The Program is divided into 2 levels - Basic and Advance. Each level has Modules consisting of Lessons which cover a small aspect of spoken English through Bi-lingual story based conversations. Each Module also has a short quiz for revision. Basic Level has 19 modules . You have to complete these 19 modules to graduate to Advance Level Testimonials Mohit Bhansali "Best course for spoken English! I really like the program, as it helps me in speaking English with my friends and teachers." Rekha Shanbhag "Wonderful Program! The idea to learn English through short stories is fun. I like the program very much." FAQs 1) Why should I enroll for English Guru Course? English has now become the second most spoken language in India, after Hindi. The need to speak and understand English now-a-days is extremely high, with people in not only urban areas, but also semi-urban and rural markets having felt the need for this language. 2) What is the English Guru Course? ENGLISH GURU, brings English learning through the learner’s native language, thus helping him cross the barriers of lack of opportunities and teachers, poor infrastructure and cost. 3) Which age group does English Guru caters to? English Guru caters to students from Class 5 onwards, a. who wish to get initiated into English speaking b. those who understand English but are unable to speak it properly. c. Those who know the basics of English speaking but are not confident about the correct pronunciation and wish to learn more about the language. 4) Which languages do English Guru teaches English through? English Guru teaches English through the following 8 Indian languages – Hindi, Marathi, Gujarati, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Malayalam, Bengali 5) What is the course structure of English Guru? The English Guru course consists of 2 Levels divided into various Modules and each module sub-divided into Chapters. The Modules are based on the CEFR (Common European Framework of Reference for Languages) guidelines for spoken English. After each Module the user is assessed through multi choice questions based on the modules learned. Report card for the same is maintained for the helping user to assess his/her performance. 6) What is the teaching methodology of English Guru? English Guru course has attempted to teach English through simple day today conversations and short stories making it easier for the student to remember and use the phrases in daily life. 7) What should the student expect to understand at the end of the Basic program? In the English Guru - Basic course content handles topics like a. Self introduction and exchange greetings & pleasantries b. Courtesies & Polite phrases c. Manners & Etiquettes d. Formal & informal behavior e. Sentences of good wishes, congratulations, encouragement & affection f. Inviting, accepting, declining, consent & apology g. Using helping verbs like can, could, may shall h. Simple descriptions i. Stating likes and dislikes j. Simple Telephonic Conversation 8) Do you have any Live Teacher to answer our doubts and queries? English Guru Course will have Live Webinars , where Teachers will cover few of the topics in depth. A doubt clearing session will also be arranged, depending on the queries we receive from the students 9) What is the basis of the English Speaking Language learning product? The English Speaking product is based on The Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR). The program helps user in improving English speaking skills through short bilingual stories. The product is level based (Basic & Advance Level) with Topics divided into Modules followed by Modular Tests. 10) Do I have to finish Module 1 to access Module 2 and so on? Yes. The English Speaking program follows adaptable structure. You are expected to complete Module 1 Lessons and Test to access Module 2. New Modules will be enabled only on completion of the previous module 11) Can I re-take the Modular tests? Yes. You can retake the Tests. 12) If I have any doubts in the Lesson who will help me solve? You can share your questions on Discussion Forum. Our Teachers will be conducting Doubt Clearing sessions either Live or a recorded session will be uploaded on the Program answering your queries. Terms & Conditions 1) Payment will be collected in advance for the current academic year. 2) No transfers/Refunds allowed. 3) Do not share your credentials with others.
content.short_description: Learn different aspects of spoken English through bilingual story-based conversations in English and Hindi. Join our English Guru Program and improve your day-to-day conversations with just a few simple words and sentences.

content.display_name: Cerebry Adaptive Mathematics Practice Platform (Grade 9)
content.overview: About the Course 1) Virtual Teaching Assistant: Cerebry adjusts to each learner’s proficiency; struggling students overcome lingering misconceptions, and stronger students face high-order problems. 2) Personalised learning for Students: Ready-to-use personalised exercises with an unlimited number of auto-graded problems to allow educators to focus on actual teaching and problem-solving. 3)Time Saved for Teachers: The problems and answer key are well explained. 4)Diagnostics and Reports for Teachers: Educators receive a detailed view of each student's achievements and also receive a precise learning journey. 5)No Plagiarism: Every student solves a different problem. Thus, Cerebry eliminates plagiarism with AI-generated questions. Course Structure The course improves the math proficiency of the students. The AI-driven platform helps them to practice and revise math problems anywhere and anytime. Subsequently, students can engage with assignments and exams to progress further. About The Partner Cerebry, the world's most advanced AI-driven adaptive math practice platform. Unlike other platforms that rely on question banks, Cerebry generates questions that are tailored to each student's needs. The platform creates topic-specific exercises according to the board curriculum, which can be administered in class or at home. Cerebry offers personalized practice exercises based on each student's proficiency level, allowing them to progress at their own pace. The platform also provides step-by-step solutions to problems, breaking down complex questions into manageable steps for students to practice. Assessment Cerebry provides assignments which can be used by school as per their own requirement. FAQs What is Cerebry Cerebry is an AI driven Math practice platform that helps students improve their conceptual understanding and scores. Cerebry has tailored Math exercises from grades 1-12 across various curricula like CBSE, ICSE, IGCSE, IB, GCE O-Level etc. Why should my child join Cerebry? Cerebry’s AI tool is powerful enough to understand the gaps that your child has in mastering a concept and provides personalized practice to get better results. One can learn at their own pace having unlimited access to practice the questions blended with interactive elements. It employs adaptive technology that focuses on vital issues, causing children to strain less and provide them with more playtime. What does a week at Cerebry look like ? The student gets to practice questions of various topics of a chapter in a week and an assessment is administered once the chapter is completed. Insightful reports of the skills mastered are generated with actionable items. What are the system requirements for me to practice Cerebry? No software installation is needed. Cerebry works on a standard browser and anyone with an internet enabled device is able to use it. Cerebry’s simple user-experience ensures students can start practicing within minutes. How are lesson plans and questions designed? Lesson Plans and questions are designed by subject matter experts tailored to the syllabus needs which take away the need to refer to the textbooks. The AI generates lots of questions of similar contexts and values for unlimited practice. Effective pre-made revision exercises are created with questions of the highest level. How can I buy a package in Cerebry? You can directly buy the package from our website, select the desired package and pay for it. Can I buy multiple packages at the same time? Yes, you can buy multiple packages. Please select the packages you are looking for from the home page. Can I reschedule the meeting in case I miss it? Yes you can reschedule the meeting. Book direct meeting slots here: https: meetings.hubspot.com/sonu-agarwal How can I keep track and be reminded about my child’s practice? Parents receive a detailed performance report from Cerebry that helps them track their child’s development and identifies areas for improvement. How do live doubt-solving sessions work? We answer questions, but only during a specific window of time. Privacy Policy 1.Introduction Welcome to Cerebry. Cerebry (“us”, “we”, or “our”) operates https: www.cerebry.co/ (hereinafter referred to as “Service”). Our Privacy Policy governs your visit to https: www.cerebry.co/, https: www.cerebry.co/mathpractice/, and explains how we collect, safeguard and disclose information that results from your use of our Service. We use your data to provide and improve Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, the terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions. Our Terms and Conditions (“Terms”) govern all use of our Service and together with the Privacy Policy constitutes your agreement with us (“agreement”). 2. Definitions SERVICE means the https: www.cerebry.co/ website operated by Cerebry. PERSONAL DATA means data about a living individual who can be identified from those data (or from those and other information either in our possession or likely to come into our possession). USAGE DATA is data collected automatically either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit). COOKIES are small files stored on your device (computer or mobile device). DATA CONTROLLER means a natural or legal person who (either alone or jointly or in common with other persons) determines the purposes for which and the manner in which any personal data are, or are to be, processed. For the purpose of this Privacy Policy, we are a Data Controller of your data. DATA PROCESSORS (OR SERVICE PROVIDERS) means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Data Controller. We may use the services of various Service Providers in order to process your data more effectively. DATA SUBJECT is any living individual who is the subject of Personal Data. THE USER is the individual using our Service. The User corresponds to the Data Subject, who is the subject of Personal Data. 3. Information Collection and Use We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you. 4. Types of Data Collected Personal Data While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you (“Personal Data”). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to: 0.1. Email address 0.2. First name and last name 0.3. Phone number 0.4. Address, Country, State, Province, ZIP/Postal code, City 0.5. Cookies and Usage Data We may use your Personal Data to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information that may be of interest to you. You may opt out of receiving any, or all, of these communications from us by following the unsubscribe link. Usage Data We may also collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Service or when you access Service by or through any device (“Usage Data”). This Usage Data may include information such as your computer’s Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data. When you access Service with a device, this Usage Data may include information such as the type of device you use, your device unique ID, the IP address of your device, your device operating system, the type of Internet browser you use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data. Location Data We may use and store information about your location if you give us permission to do so (“Location Data”). We use this data to provide features of our Service, to improve and customize our Service. You can enable or disable location services when you use our Service at any time by way of your device settings. Tracking Cookies Data We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and we hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device. Other tracking technologies are also used such as beacons, tags and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our Service. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service. Examples of Cookies we use: 0.1. Session Cookies: We use Session Cookies to operate our Service. 0.2. Preference Cookies: We use Preference Cookies to remember your preferences and various settings. 0.3. Security Cookies: We use Security Cookies for security purposes. 0.4. Advertising Cookies: Advertising Cookies are used to serve you with advertisements that may be relevant to you and your interests. Other Data While using our Service, we may also collect the following information: sex, age, date of birth, place of birth, passport details, citizenship, registration at place of residence and actual address, telephone number (work, mobile), details of documents on education, qualification, professional training, employment agreements, NDA agreements, information on bonuses and compensation, information on marital status, family members, social security (or other taxpayer identification) number, office location and other data. 5. Use of Data Cerebry uses the collected data for various purposes: 0.1. to provide and maintain our Service; 0.2. to notify you about changes to our Service; 0.3. to allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service when you choose to do so; 0.4. to provide customer support; 0.5. to gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our Service; 0.6. to monitor the usage of our Service; 0.7. to detect, prevent and address technical issues; 0.8. to fulfil any other purpose for which you provide it; 0.9. to carry out our obligations and enforce our rights arising from any contracts entered into between you and us, including for billing and collection; 0.10. to provide you with notices about your account and/or subscription, including expiration and renewal notices, email-instructions, etc.; 0.11. to provide you with news, special offers and general information about other goods, services and events which we offer that are similar to those that you have already purchased or enquired about unless you have opted not to receive such information; 0.12. in any other way we may describe when you provide the information; 0.13. for any other purpose with your consent. 6. Retention of Data We will retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies. We will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period, except when this data is used to strengthen the security or to improve the functionality of our Service, or we are legally obligated to retain this data for longer time periods. 7. Transfer of Data Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to – and maintained on – computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from those of your jurisdiction. If you are located outside Singapore and choose to provide information to us, please note that we transfer the data, including Personal Data, to Singapore and process it there. Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by your submission of such information represents your agreement to that transfer. Cerebry will take all the steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of your Personal Data will take place to an organisation or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of your data and other personal information. . Disclosure of Data We may disclose personal information that we collect, or you provide: 0.1. Disclosure for Law Enforcement. Under certain circumstances, we may be required to disclose your Personal Data if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities. 0.2. Business Transaction. If we or our subsidiaries are involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, your Personal Data may be transferred. 0.3. Other cases. We may disclose your information also: 0.3.1. to our subsidiaries and affiliates; 0.3.2. to contractors, service providers, and other third parties we use to support our business; 0.3.3. to fulfill the purpose for which you provide it; 0.3.4. for the purpose of including your company’s logo on our website; 0.3.5. for any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the information; 0.3.6. with your consent in any other cases; 0.3.7. if we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to protect the rights, property, or safety of the Company, our customers, or others. 9. Security of Data The security of your data is important to us but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. 10. Your Data Protection Rights Under General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) If you are a resident of the European Union (EU) and European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights, covered by GDPR. We aim to take reasonable steps to allow you to correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of your Personal Data. If you wish to be informed what Personal Data we hold about you and if you want it to be removed from our systems, please email us at info@cerebry.co. In certain circumstances, you have the following data protection rights: 0.1. the right to access, update or to delete the information we have on you; 0.2. the right of rectification. You have the right to have your information rectified if that information is inaccurate or incomplete; 0.3. the right to object. You have the right to object to our processing of your Personal Data; 0.4. the right of restriction. You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal information; 0.5. the right to data portability. You have the right to be provided with a copy of your Personal Data in a structured, machine-readable and commonly used format; 0.6. the right to withdraw consent. You also have the right to withdraw your consent at any time where we rely on your consent to process your personal information; Please note that we may ask you to verify your identity before responding to such requests. Please note, we may not able to provide Service without some necessary data. You have the right to complain to a Data Protection Authority about our collection and use of your Personal Data. For more information, please contact your local data protection authority in the European Economic Area (EEA). 11. Your Data Protection Rights under the California Privacy Protection Act (CalOPPA) CalOPPA is the first state law in the nation to require commercial websites and online services to post a privacy policy. The law’s reach stretches well beyond California to require a person or company in the United States (and conceivable the world) that operates websites collecting personally identifiable information from California consumers to post a conspicuous privacy policy on its website stating exactly the information being collected and those individuals with whom it is being shared, and to comply with this policy. According to CalOPPA we agree to the following: 0.1. users can visit our site anonymously; 0.2. our Privacy Policy link includes the word “Privacy”, and can easily be found on the home page of our website; 0.3. users will be notified of any privacy policy changes on our Privacy Policy Page; 0.4. users are able to change their personal information by emailing us at info@cerebry.co. Our Policy on “Do Not Track” Signals: We honor Do Not Track signals and do not track, plant cookies, or use advertising when a Do Not Track browser mechanism is in place. Do Not Track is a preference you can set in your web browser to inform websites that you do not want to be tracked. You can enable or disable Do Not Track by visiting the Preferences or Settings page of your web browser. 12. Your Data Protection Rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) If you are a California resident, you are entitled to learn what data we collect about you, ask to delete your data and not to sell (share) it. To exercise your data protection rights, you can make certain requests and ask us: 0.1. What personal information we have about you. If you make this request, we will return to you: 0.0.1. The categories of personal information we have collected about you. 0.0.2. The categories of sources from which we collect your personal information. 0.0.3. The business or commercial purpose for collecting or selling your personal information. 0.0.4. The categories of third parties with whom we share personal information. 0.0.5. The specific pieces of personal information we have collected about you. 0.0.6. A list of categories of personal information that we have sold, along with the category of any other company we sold it to. If we have not sold your personal information, we will inform you of that fact. 0.0.7. A list of categories of personal information that we have disclosed for a business purpose, along with the category of any other company we shared it with. Please note, you are entitled to ask us to provide you with this information up to two times in a rolling twelve-month period. When you make this request, the information provided may be limited to the personal information we collected about you in the previous 12 months. 0.2. To delete your personal information. If you make this request, we will delete the personal information we hold about you as of the date of your request from our records and direct any service providers to do the same. In some cases, deletion may be accomplished through de-identification of the information. If you choose to delete your personal information, you may not be able to use certain functions that require your personal information to operate. 0.3. To stop selling your personal information. We don’t sell or rent your personal information to any third parties for any purpose. We do not sell your personal information for monetary consideration. However, under some circumstances, a transfer of personal information to a third party, or within our family of companies, without monetary consideration may be considered a “sale” under California law. You are the only owner of your Personal Data and can request disclosure or deletion at any time. If you submit a request to stop selling your personal information, we will stop making such transfers. Please note, if you ask us to delete or stop selling your data, it may impact your experience with us, and you may not be able to participate in certain programs or membership services which require the usage of your personal information to function. But in no circumstances, we will discriminate against you for exercising your rights. To exercise your California data protection rights described above, please send your request(s) by email: info@cerebry.co. Your data protection rights, described above, are covered by the CCPA, short for the California Consumer Privacy Act. To find out more, visit the official California Legislative Information website. The CCPA took effect on 01/01/2020. 13. Service Providers We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service (“Service Providers”), provide Service on our behalf, perform Service-related services or assist us in analysing how our Service is used. These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose. 14. Analytics We may use third-party Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service. 15. CI/CD tools We may use third-party Service Providers to automate the development process of our Service. 16. Behavioral Remarketing We may use remarketing services to advertise on third party websites to you after you visited our Service. We and our third-party vendors use cookies to inform, optimize and serve ads based on your past visits to our Service. 17. Payments We may provide paid products and/or services within Service. In that case, we use third-party services for payment processing (e.g. payment processors). We will not store or collect your payment card details. That information is provided directly to our third-party payment processors whose use of your personal information is governed by their Privacy Policy. These payment processors adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, Mastercard, American Express and Discover. PCI-DSS requirements help ensure the secure handling of payment information. 18. Links to Other Sites Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click a third party link, you will be directed to that third party’s site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services. For example, the outlined privacy policy has been made using PolicyMaker.io, a free tool that helps create high-quality legal documents. PolicyMaker’s privacy policy generator is an easy-to-use tool for creating a privacy policy for blog, website, e-commerce store or mobile app. 19. Children’s Privacy Our Services are not intended for use by children under the age of 18 (“Child” or “Children”). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from Children under 18. If you become aware that a Child has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from Children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers. 20. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let you know via email and/or a prominent notice on our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update “effective date” at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. 21. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us by email: info@cerebry.co.

The AI generates lots of questions of similar contexts and values for unlimited practice. Effective pre-made revision exercises are created with questions of the highest level. Your Data Protection Rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) If you are a California resident, you are entitled to learn what data we collect about you, ask to delete your data and not to sell (share) it. content.display_name: Practice Math In A Fun Way With An AI-Powered Platform - For Grade 6
content.overview: About the Course 1) Virtual Teaching Assistant: Cerebry adjusts to each learner’s proficiency; struggling students overcome lingering misconceptions, and stronger students face high-order problems. 2) Personalised learning for Students: Ready-to-use personalised exercises with an unlimited number of auto-graded problems to allow educators to focus on actual teaching and problem-solving. 3)Time Saved for Teachers: The problems and answer key are well explained. 4)Diagnostics and Reports for Teachers: Educators receive a detailed view of each student's achievements and also receive a precise learning journey. 5)No Plagiarism: Every student solves a different problem. Thus, Cerebry eliminates plagiarism with AI-generated questions. Course Structure The course improves the math proficiency of the students. The AI-driven platform helps them to practice and revise math problems anywhere and anytime. Subsequently, students can engage with assignments and exams to progress further. About The Partner Cerebry, the world's most advanced AI-driven adaptive math practice platform. Unlike other platforms that rely on question banks, Cerebry generates questions that are tailored to each student's needs. The platform creates topic-specific exercises according to the board curriculum, which can be administered in class or at home. Cerebry offers personalized practice exercises based on each student's proficiency level, allowing them to progress at their own pace. The platform also provides step-by-step solutions to problems, breaking down complex questions into manageable steps for students to practice. Assessment Cerebry provides assignments which can be used by school as per their own requirement. FAQs What is Cerebry Cerebry is an AI driven Math practice platform that helps students improve their conceptual understanding and scores. Cerebry has tailored Math exercises from grades 1-12 across various curricula like CBSE, ICSE, IGCSE, IB, GCE O-Level etc. Why should my child join Cerebry? Cerebry’s AI tool is powerful enough to understand the gaps that your child has in mastering a concept and provides personalized practice to get better results. One can learn at their own pace having unlimited access to practice the questions blended with interactive elements. It employs adaptive technology that focuses on vital issues, causing children to strain less and provide them with more playtime. What does a week at Cerebry look like ? The student gets to practice questions of various topics of a chapter in a week and an assessment is administered once the chapter is completed. Insightful reports of the skills mastered are generated with actionable items. What are the system requirements for me to practice Cerebry? No software installation is needed. Cerebry works on a standard browser and anyone with an internet enabled device is able to use it. Cerebry’s simple user-experience ensures students can start practicing within minutes. How are lesson plans and questions designed? Lesson Plans and questions are designed by subject matter experts tailored to the syllabus needs which take away the need to refer to the textbooks. The AI generates lots of questions of similar contexts and values for unlimited practice. Effective pre-made revision exercises are created with questions of the highest level. How can I buy a package in Cerebry? You can directly buy the package from our website, select the desired package and pay for it. Can I buy multiple packages at the same time? Yes, you can buy multiple packages. Please select the packages you are looking for from the home page. Can I reschedule the meeting in case I miss it? Yes you can reschedule the meeting. Book direct meeting slots here: https: meetings.hubspot.com/sonu-agarwal How can I keep track and be reminded about my child’s practice? Parents receive a detailed performance report from Cerebry that helps them track their child’s development and identifies areas for improvement. How do live doubt-solving sessions work?
